children.text: This is sample data only. Duplicate this template for your organization.
There are two different KPIs: Organization KPIs and Core Contributor KPIs.
Each KPI has a maximum point determined based on its relative importance.
The bonus will be determined by the points collected through the KPIs.
The size of the bonus pool is determined every quarter.
Let's decide the size of the bonus pool for this quarter.
PS: If you change the Bonus Pool, the bonus calculation will be updated automatically.
Let's create a system to determine how much of the allocated bonus will be distributed:
Distributed Bonus: Distribution Multiplier X Bonus Pool

If the total Organization KPI Points between
0 and 19.9 then the multiplier is 0
20 and 23.9 then the multiplier is 0.5
24 and 31.9 then the multiplier is 0.8
32 and 40 then the multiplier is 1
We need to enter the results to calculate the distributed bonus, so please enter the results in the table.
Based on the results the total earned points is
and the amount of the bonus to distribute is
Let's see the KPIs of core contributors.
Let's enter the results to calculate points for Core Contributor KPIs.
to the core contributors based on Organization KPI and Core Contributor KPI results.
Please share your questions and feedback with me: tolga at tolgadizmen.com
